verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My soul magnifies the Lord
And my spirit rejoices in my God
My soul magnifies the Lord
And my spirit doth rejoice in God my Saviour
Come magnify with me
And let us exalt His name together
My help and shield are found in Him
My soul waits for the Lord
My soul waits for the Lord
My soul makes her boast in Thee
The humble shall hear it and be glad
My soul makes her boast in Thee
The humble shall hear and they shall be glad
O taste and see that the Lord is good x3
I called on Him and He answered me
This poor man cried and the Lord heard x3
He delivered me from all my fears
